mapper.select: select c.cartNo, c.productOptionNo, c.userNo, c.buyAmount, c.cartTime, p.categoryNo, p.productNo, p.name, po.productOptionName, po.productAmount, po.addPrice, p.basicPrice , po.addPrice+p.basicPrice as eachPrice from cart c, productOption po, product p where c.userNo=#{userNo} and c.productOptionNo = po.productOptionNo and p.productNo=(select productNo from productOption where productOptionNo= c.productOptionNo) order by (select productNo from productOption where productOptionNo= c.productOptionNo), productOptionNo asc ,buyAmount desc
mapper.insert: insert into cart(productOptionNo, userNo, buyAmount, cartTime) values(#{productOptionNo}, #{userNo}, #{buyAmount}, date(now()))
mapper.delete: delete from cart where userNo = #{userNo} and productOptionNo = #{productOptionNo}
